exchange = 'HitBTC'

    @allure.title("Delete connected exchange")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize(**CredentialsParams.ddt_exchange_value)
    def test_delete_exchange(self, page: Page, create_session, exchange):
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        credentials_page = CredentialsPage(page)
        credential_details_page = CredentialDetailsPage(page)
        danger_zone = DangerZone(page)
        notifications = Notifications(page)
    
        toast_message = \
            "Request to delete credentials was successfully created. PLease wait until system will delete it completely"
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            login_page.goto()
            create_session()
    
        with allure.step("Go to credentials page"):
            credentials_page.goto(endpoint=credentials_page.slug)
    
        with allure.step("Open connected {exchange}"):
            credentials_page.click_on_connected_exchange(self.exchange_comment.get(exchange))
            credential_details_page.wait_for_credential_page()
    
        with allure.step("Delete connected exchange"):
            danger_zone.click_danger_zone()
            danger_zone.click_danger_zone_delete_btn()
            danger_zone.insert_confirmation_msg("Delete")
            danger_zone.click_confirm_delete_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify deleting exchange"):
            assert notifications.wait_for_success_toast() is True
            assert notifications.get_success_toast_message() == toast_message
>           assert credentials_page.wait_for_exchange_pending_status() is True
